Package edu.harvard.cga.gtools.tekml.pdate

Class Summary
ISO8601PrecisionDateFormatter Formatter for dates adhering to the ISO8601 Standard as codified by XMLSchema This implementation is incomplete - only Dates, not times, are handled Unlike other java implementations (e.g., see joda.time) the following are salient date resolution for year, month, and day the leading hyphen for dates BCE With Sun JVM, max values for years BCE between 292270000 and 292260000 which is not the same as the max for CE dates returned by the max value call there appears to be an error since min value returns "1" Follows java.text.DateFormatter patterns: returns null on parse error
